Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the frog skin active peptide family (Brevinin subfamily)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209P (MIC=2.6 µM);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=1.1 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Shows antibacterial against the Gram-positive bacterium S. aureus and the Gram-negative bacterium E. coli.

Literature.Title: Cloning from tissue surrogates antimicrobial peptide (esculentin) cDNAs from the defensive skin secretions of Chinese ranid frogs.
Literature.Author: Chen T, Zhou M, Chen W, Lorimer J, Rao P, Walker B, Shaw C.
